title: repo.data
text: packages last updated? uses sessionInfo() output find date last installation. sister function arbitrary data: date doesn’t mean packages date given date (can easily checked old.packages())
code: cran_session() #> [1] "2025-04-12" versions <- data.frame(Package = c("dplyr", "Rcpp"),                        Version = c("1.1.4", "0.8.9")) versions #>   Package Version #> 1   dplyr   1.1.4 #> 2    Rcpp   0.8.9 cran_date(versions) #> [1] "2023-11-17"

title: repo.data
text: ever wonder packages risk can use cran_doom(): reproducibility session info:
code: cd <- cran_doom(bioc = TRUE) #> Retrieving CRAN_db, this might take a bit. Next call will be faster. #> Retrieving bioc_available_release, this might take a bit. Next call will be faster. cd[c("time_till_last", "last_archived", "npackages")] #> $time_till_last #> Time difference of 43 days #>  #> $last_archived #> [1] "2025-06-03" #>  #> $npackages #>  CRAN   all  #> 22350 26051 knitr::kable(cd$details) sessionInfo() #> R Under development (unstable) (2025-04-19 r88161) #> Platform: x86_64-pc-linux-gnu #> Running under: Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS #>  #> Matrix products: default #> BLAS:   /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openblas-pthread/libblas.so.3  #> LAPACK: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openblas-pthread/libopenblasp-r0.3.26.so;  LAPACK version 3.12.0 #>  #> locale: #>  [1] LC_CTYPE=C.UTF-8       LC_NUMERIC=C           LC_TIME=C.UTF-8        #>  [4] LC_COLLATE=C.UTF-8     LC_MONETARY=C.UTF-8    LC_MESSAGES=C.UTF-8    #>  [7] LC_PAPER=C.UTF-8       LC_NAME=C              LC_ADDRESS=C           #> [10] LC_TELEPHONE=C         LC_MEASUREMENT=C.UTF-8 LC_IDENTIFICATION=C    #>  #> time zone: UTC #> tzcode source: system (glibc) #>  #> attached base packages: #> [1] stats     graphics  grDevices utils     datasets  methods   base      #>  #> other attached packages: #> [1] repo.data_0.0.0.9003 #>  #> loaded via a namespace (and not attached): #>  [1] cli_3.6.4         knitr_1.50        rlang_1.1.6       xfun_0.52         #>  [5] rversions_2.1.2   textshaping_1.0.0 jsonlite_2.0.0    litedown_0.7      #>  [9] markdown_2.0      htmltools_0.5.8.1 ragg_1.4.0        sass_0.4.10       #> [13] rmarkdown_2.29    evaluate_1.0.3    jquerylib_0.1.4   fastmap_1.2.0     #> [17] yaml_2.3.10       lifecycle_1.0.4   compiler_4.6.0    fs_1.6.6          #> [21] systemfonts_1.2.2 digest_0.6.37     R6_2.6.1          curl_6.2.2        #> [25] commonmark_1.9.5  bslib_0.9.0       tools_4.6.0       xml2_1.3.8        #> [29] pkgdown_2.1.1     cachem_1.1.0      desc_1.4.3

title: Authors and Citation
text: Lluís Revilla Sancho. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Revilla Sancho L (2025). repo.data: Get repository data. R package version 0.0.0.9003, https://github.com/llrs/repo.data.
code: @Manual{,   title = {repo.data: Get repository data},   author = {Lluís {Revilla Sancho}},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9003},   url = {https://github.com/llrs/repo.data}, }

title: Get repository data
text: goal repo.data make repository data accessible. Mainly consumes existing data idea also generate .

title: Get repository data
text: can install development version repo.data like :
code: remotes::install_github("llrs/repo.data")

title: Get repository data
text: can get data.frame packages CRAN archive: can also check CRAN comments packages archive: estimate last date update packages, information session info data.frame:
code: library(repo.data) ca <- cran_archive() head(ca) #>         package      published_date version cran_team   size   status #> 1            A3 2013-02-07 09:00:29   0.9.1    hornik  45252 archived #> 2            A3 2013-03-26 18:58:40   0.9.2    ligges  45907 archived #> 3            A3 2015-08-16 21:05:54   1.0.0    hornik  42810  current #> 4 AalenJohansen 2023-03-01 10:42:11     1.0    ligges 165057  current #> 5          aaMI 2005-06-24 15:55:17   1.0-0      root   2968 archived #> 6          aaMI 2005-10-17 19:24:18   1.0-1      root   3487 archived cc <- cran_comments() head(cc) #>       package #> 1       aaSEA #> 2         aba #> 3      abbyyR #> 4      abcADM #> 5    abcdeFBA #> 6 ABCExtremes #>                                                                                        comment #> 1               Archived on 2022-06-21 as check problems were not corrected despite reminders. #> 2                         Archived on 2022-03-27 as check problems were not corrected in time. #> 3                                          Archived on 2023-11-03 at the maintainer's request. #> 4                                 Archived on 2023-03-02 as issues were not corrected in time. #> 5                         Archived on 2022-03-07 as check problems were not corrected in time. #> 6 Archived on 2015-06-19 as incomplete maintainer address was not corrected despite reminders. #>         date   action #> 1 2022-06-21 archived #> 2 2022-03-27 archived #> 3 2023-11-03 archived #> 4 2023-03-02 archived #> 5 2022-03-07 archived #> 6 2015-06-19 archived cran_session(session = sessionInfo()) #> [1] "2024-11-08" ip <- installed.packages() cran_date(ip) #> [1] "2024-12-08"

title: Get repository data
text: packages related analysis : Task views: https://github.com/epiverse-connect/ctv-analysis/ static packages: pkgstats Bioconductor: biopkgtools R-universe: universe cranly: package dependencies authors packages.

title: Get repository data
text: package comes analysis CRAN data https://llrs.dev

title: Base R's alias — base_alias
text: Retrieve alias available R.

title: Base R's alias — base_alias
code: base_alias(packages = NULL)

title: Base R's alias — base_alias
text: packages vector packages NULL packages.

title: Base R's alias — base_alias
text: data.frame three columns: Package, Source Target.

title: Base R's alias — base_alias
code: ba <- base_alias() #> Retrieving base_aliases, this might take a bit. Next call will be faster. #> Warning: Packages ‘base’, ‘parallel’ have targets not present in some OS. head(ba) #>   Package        Source Target #> 1    base Arithmetic.Rd      + #> 2    base Arithmetic.Rd      - #> 3    base Arithmetic.Rd      * #> 4    base Arithmetic.Rd     ** #> 5    base Arithmetic.Rd      / #> 6    base Arithmetic.Rd      ^

title: Help pages with cliques — base_help_cliques
text: help pages links closed networks.

title: Help pages with cliques — base_help_cliques
code: base_help_cliques()

title: Help pages with cliques — base_help_cliques
text: Return data.frame help pages connected network help pages.

title: Help pages with cliques — base_help_cliques
text: Requires igraph

title: Help pages with cliques — base_help_cliques
code: base_help_cliques() #> Warning: Packages ‘base’, ‘parallel’ have targets not present in some OS. #> Retrieving base_rdxrefs, this might take a bit. Next call will be faster. #> Warning: Some pages point to different places according to the OS. #> Warning: Some links are distinct depending on the OS. #>   from_pkg          from_Rd clique to_pkg            to_Rd  n #> 1     grid absolute.size.Rd      1   grid  widthDetails.Rd  1 #> 2     grid  widthDetails.Rd      1   grid absolute.size.Rd  1 #> 3     grid    gridCoords.Rd      2   grid    grobCoords.Rd  1 #> 4     grid    grobCoords.Rd      2   grid    gridCoords.Rd  1 #> 5    tools    HTMLheader.Rd      3   <NA>             <NA> NA #> 6    tools        toHTML.Rd      3  tools    HTMLheader.Rd  2

title: Help pages without links — base_help_pages_not_linked
text: Help pages without links help pages. makes harder navigate related help pages.

title: Help pages without links — base_help_pages_not_linked
code: base_help_pages_not_linked()

title: Help pages without links — base_help_pages_not_linked
text: data.frame two columns: Package Source

title: Help pages without links — base_help_pages_not_linked
code: bhnl <- base_help_pages_not_linked() #> Warning: Packages ‘base’, ‘parallel’ have targets not present in some OS. #> Warning: Some pages point to different places according to the OS. #> Warning: Some links are distinct depending on the OS. head(bhnl) #>   Package              Source #> 1    base        Constants.Rd #> 2    base Foreign-internal.Rd #> 3    base      ISOdatetime.Rd #> 4    base       Last.value.Rd #> 5    base         S3method.Rd #> 6    base   StackOverflows.Rd

title: Help pages not linked from base R. — base_help_pages_wo_links
text: Help pages without links help pages. makes harder find .

title: Help pages not linked from base R. — base_help_pages_wo_links
code: base_help_pages_wo_links()

title: Help pages not linked from base R. — base_help_pages_wo_links
text: data.frame two columns: Package Source

title: Help pages not linked from base R. — base_help_pages_wo_links
code: bhwl <- base_help_pages_wo_links() #> Warning: Packages ‘base’, ‘parallel’ have targets not present in some OS. #> Warning: Some pages point to different places according to the OS. #> Warning: Some links are distinct depending on the OS. head(bhwl) #>   Package          Source #> 1    base     S3method.Rd #> 2    base   Sys.getpid.Rd #> 3    base    Sys.sleep.Rd #> 4    base       append.Rd #> 5    base       asplit.Rd #> 6    base base-package.Rd

title: Base R's links — base_links
text: Retrieve links R documentation files.

title: Base R's links — base_links
code: base_links(packages = NULL)

title: Base R's links — base_links
text: packages vector packages NULL packages.

title: Base R's links — base_links
text: data.frame links R's files. 4 columns: Package, Anchor, Target Source.

title: Base R's links — base_links
code: bl <- base_links() head(bl) #>   Package        Source   Target          Anchor #> 1    base Arithmetic.Rd      Ops =S3groupGeneric #> 2    base Arithmetic.Rd      Ops =S3groupGeneric #> 3    base Arithmetic.Rd infinite                 #> 4    base Arithmetic.Rd   double                 #> 5    base Arithmetic.Rd   double                 #> 6    base Arithmetic.Rd  warning

what: Links between help pages by page — base_pages_links
title: Links between help pages by page — base_pages_links
text: Explore relationship base R packages help pages. target help page ambiguous omitted.

title: Links between help pages by page — base_pages_links
code: base_pages_links(packages = NULL)

title: Links between help pages by page — base_pages_links
text: packages vector packages NULL packages.

title: Links between help pages by page — base_pages_links
text: data.frame 6 columns: from_pkg, from_Rd, to_pkg, to_Rd, n (Number links).

title: Links between help pages by page — base_pages_links
code: bpl <- base_pages_links() #> Retrieving base_targets_links, this might take a bit. Next call will be faster. #> Warning: Packages ‘base’, ‘parallel’ have targets not present in some OS. #> Retrieving cran_aliases, this might take a bit. Next call will be faster. #> Warning: Packages ‘Hmisc’, ‘geneHapR’, ‘sfsmisc’, ‘tcltk2’ have targets not present in some OS. #> Warning: Some pages point to different places according to the OS. #> Warning: Some links are distinct depending on the OS. #> Error in `[<-`(`*tmp*`, , old_name, value = sum(xy[, column_to_add, drop = TRUE])): subscript out of bounds head(bpl) #> Error: object 'bpl' not found

what: Links between help pages by package — base_pkges_links

code: # \donttest{ ca <- cran_archive() #> Retrieving cran_archive, this might take a bit. Next call will be faster. #> Warning: There are 6 packages both archived and published #> This indicate manual CRAN intervention. head(ca) #>    Package            Datetime Version   User   Size   Status #> 1       A3 2013-02-07 09:00:29   0.9.1 hornik  45252 archived #> 2       A3 2013-03-26 18:58:40   0.9.2 ligges  45907 archived #> 3       A3 2015-08-16 21:05:54   1.0.0 hornik  42810  current #> 4 AATtools 2020-06-14 15:10:07   0.0.1 ligges 145230 archived #> 5 AATtools 2022-08-12 13:40:11   0.0.2 ligges 249141 archived #> 6 AATtools 2024-08-16 09:10:08   0.0.3 ligges 252641  current # }

title: CRAN comments — cran_comments

title: CRAN comments — cran_comments
code: cran_comments(packages = NULL)

title: CRAN comments — cran_comments
text: packages vector packages NULL packages.

title: CRAN comments — cran_comments
text: data.frame four columns: package, comment, date action.

title: CRAN comments — cran_comments
text: comments slightly edited: multiple comments action joined together can displayed single line. Actions inferred 7 keywords: archived, orphaned, removed, renamed, replaced, unarchived, unorphaned.

title: CRAN comments — cran_comments
text: can room improvement: comments describe two actions, please let know think can improved. actions can described multiple comments/lines order. Compare original file case doubts.

title: CRAN comments — cran_comments
text: Original file: https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/PACKAGES.

title: CRAN comments — cran_comments
code: # \donttest{ cc <- cran_comments() #> Retrieving comments, this might take a bit. Next call will be faster. head(cc) #>       package #> 1 ABCExtremes #> 2       ABCp2 #> 3       ABCp2 #> 4      ACCLMA #> 5         ACD #> 6        ACDC #>                                                                                            comment #> 1     Archived on 2015-06-19 as incomplete maintainer address was not corrected despite reminders. #> 2                     Archived on 2015-07-01 as maintainer address <duryea@dartmouth.edu> bounced. #> 3                           Archived on 2025-01-26 as issues were not corrected despite reminders. #> 4 Archived on 2021-02-05 as issues were not corrected despite reminders: 'xtfrm()' on data frames. #> 5                   Archived on 2022-06-08 as check problems were not corrected despite reminders. #> 6                                         Archived on 2023-05-09 at the request of the maintainer. #>         date   action #> 1 2015-06-19 archived #> 2 2015-07-01 archived #> 3 2025-01-26 archived #> 4 2021-02-05 archived #> 5 2022-06-08 archived #> 6 2023-05-09 archived # }

what: Calculate time till packages are archived — cran_doom
title: Calculate time till packages are archived — cran_doom
text: Given deadlines CRAN volunteers packages can archived can trigger packages archived. code calculates much time chain reaction go maintainer fix/update packages.

title: Calculate time till packages are archived — cran_doom
code: cran_doom(which = "strong", bioc = FALSE)

title: Calculate time till packages are archived — cran_doom
text: character vector listing types     dependencies, subset     c("Depends", "Imports", "LinkingTo", "Suggests", "Enhances").     Character string "" shorthand vector,     character string "" vector without     "Enhances",     character string "strong" (default) first three     elements vector. bioc Logical value Bioconductor packages provided, (Requires internet connection).

title: Calculate time till packages are archived — cran_doom
text: list multiple elements: time_till_last: Time till last package affected. last_archived: date last package affected. npackages: Numeric vector number packages used. details: data.frame information individual package: Name, date affected, affected directly, repository, times affected (archival causing issues.)

title: Calculate time till packages are archived — cran_doom
text: Packages Suggested: field

title: Calculate time till packages are archived — cran_doom
text: Original code : https://github.com/schochastics/cran-doomsday/blob/main/index.qmd

title: Calculate time till packages are archived — cran_doom
code: cd <- cran_doom() head(cd$details) #>          Package   Deadline   type repo n_affected #> 1          CIDER 2025-04-17 direct CRAN          7 #> 2             QF 2025-04-17 direct CRAN          1 #> 3        pkgdown 2025-04-20 direct CRAN          3 #> 4 stortingscrape 2025-04-21 direct CRAN          3 #> 5  SemNetCleaner 2025-04-22 direct CRAN          6 #> 6            AFM 2025-04-22 direct CRAN          5
